meanings.definition: To go back over a path or route.
meanings.sent1: She retraces her steps to find the lost key.
meanings.sent2: He retraces his route to make sure he didn't miss anything.
meanings.sent3: The detective retraces the crime scene, looking for clues.
meanings.sent4: Memories retraces our past, bringing back forgotten moments.
meanings.sent5: The hiker retraces the trail, enjoying the familiar scenery.

meanings.definition: To follow the same steps or actions as before.
meanings.sent1: The artist retraces his sketch to make it clearer.
meanings.sent2: She retraces her routine every morning without fail.
meanings.sent3: The robot retraces its programming, repeating the same task.
meanings.sent4: History retraces itself, showing patterns of events.
meanings.sent5: The child retraces the letters to practice writing neatly.
